sources.title: Hercules And The Masked Rider
sources.description: 1963 directed by Piero Pierotti starring Sergio Ciani, Mimmo Palmara, Jose Greci, Pilar Cansino, Ettore Manni, Renato Navarrini, Arturo Dominici, Dina de Santis, Piero Leri and Ugo Sasso.   In 16 th Century Spain, the goodly Don Francisco reluctantly betroths his busty daughter to the badly Don Ramiro, in order to save the family estate.   Fortunately, the hunky Don Juan returns from warring and joins a band of gypsies, who are aided by an even hunkier Hercules, and takes up a fight against the rotten Ramiro.

metadata.Plot: In 16th century Spain, Don Francisco reluctantly betroths his daughter, Blanca, to the arrogant Don Ramiro in order to preserve the lands in the family estate. Then Don Juan, Don Francisco's nephew and Blanca's true love, returns from the war in Flanders. Don Juan dons a mask and joins with a gypsy band led by Estella to fight against the forces of Don Ramiro. In this effort he's aided by a bare-chested muscleman and also by Captain Blasco who works for Don Ramiro but whose sympathies lie elsewhere.
metadata.Writer: Luciano Martino, Piero Pierotti, Ernesto Gastaldi
metadata.Actors: Sergio Ciani, Mimmo Palmara, José Greci
